Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it’s got vibes that pulls you back again to watch it.
I was repelled by this version of the fable : forced characters and predictable plot. However one can’t deny that “The Woods are Dark” pays a tribute to this fantasy tale found in all cultures.
Authentic and wise tuning between tradition

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find.
